name: We Fix it!
description:
We Fix It! A house repair/cleaning company that can fix your house for you! This is a local multiplayer party game for 2-4 players.
How to play:
You should fix the house by doing 4 main objectives: - Fill the Pool with water. - Clear the dirt pools around the house. These can only be cleaned with water jet. - Deliver the dishes from the truck to the kitchen. - Put any trash that may be in the house in the trash bin outside. Tips: - Dishes that are dropped outside of the kitchen become trash!
- You can slip at the hose and the dirt pools, so be careful!
- When you slip you drop any item that you may be holding. Controls : Player 1:
WASD & Left Shift Player 2:
Arrow Keys & Right Ctrl Player 3:
IJKL & Space Player 4:
Numpad 8456 & Numpad Enter Credits

Programming & Game Design:
Jordan "Fahrenheit"  Silva and Guilherme Sehna.

3D Art:
Nathan Schneider

We submitted this game to the Global Game Jam 2020 #GGJ20
